benzaldehyde C6H5CHO, the simplest aromatic aldehyde

sentences.english: Technical progress of domestic and foreign acetone-benzol dewaxing units were introduced in detail.

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide can cause fabric to discolour on contact. Use with care.

sentences.english: A skincare mask formulated specifically for people with acne is likely to include benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid.

sentences.english: But benzoyl peroxide dries out skin causing itching or allergic reactions.

sentences.english: A benzfluorenone spectrophotometric method is introduced for the determination of germanium in organic germanium beverage.

sentences.english: So to prepare natural benzaldehyde under the conditions is available and the recovery is steady.

sentences.english: Protocatechuic acid , 4-hydmxyphenyl-lactic acid are separated from the plant for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 原兒茶酸，羥基苯乳酸首次從該種植物中分離得到。

sentences.english: Benzaldehyde and benzyl alcohol are main volatile flavor compounds in Agaricus blazei.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲醛和苯甲醇是姬松茸中的主要風味物質。

sentences.english: Other fixatives which may be used include the oleoresins such as benzoin, or styrax.
